title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - CD&DVD - DVD-R Sony 4.7GB 16X  Bulk (N/W)
specs: Product Information:Sony 50DMR47BSP DVD-R. Pack of DVD-R with 16x-speed, supplied in 50-spindle box. Ideal for fast data recording and convenient bulk storage. 4.7 GB capacity. Compatible for playback with most existing DVD Video players and DVD-Rom PC drives.
